snippet.title: 428: Shibuya Scramble PS4 Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The scramble begins! 428: Shibuya Scramble comes to the PS4 and Steam this summer 2018!

Preorder Now!

Amazon: https://tinyurl.com/y9j9xbjk
GameStop: https://tinyurl.com/yc4fvool

Website: http://spike-chunsoft.com/428
Steam page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/648580/428_Shibuya_Scramble/


KEY FEATURES

A Mosaic of Mediums - Unlike traditional visual novels, the narrative is presented with a palette of different mediums, combining text, live action stills, and video sequences.

Non-linear Storytelling - Five Protagonists. 10 Hours. Decisions made in one character’s story can affect the story of another character in unforeseen ways, culminating in a total of over 90 different endings!

Famitsu Fresh - One of the very few titles to ever receive a perfect score (40/40) from Japanese video game magazine Famitsu Weekly!
